remarks.para: The actual structure in WinNT.h is named IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32 and IMAGE_NT_HEADERS is defined as IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32. However, if _WIN64 is defined, then IMAGE_NT_HEADERS is defined as IMAGE_NT_HEADERS64.

summary.para: A 4-byte signature identifying the file as a PE image. The bytes are "PE\0\0".
An structure that specifies the file header.
An structure that specifies the optional file header.

remarks.para: The actual structure in WinNT.h is named IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32 and IMAGE_NT_HEADERS is defined as IMAGE_NT_HEADERS32. However, if _WIN64 is defined, then IMAGE_NT_HEADERS is defined as IMAGE_NT_HEADERS64.

summary.para: A 4-byte signature identifying the file as a PE image. The bytes are "PE\0\0".
An structure that specifies the file header.
An structure that specifies the optional file header.
